rates.category: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including Article 104 of the VAT Directive) ( Formerly restricted to: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including articles 104, 105 and 120 of the VAT Directive) )
rates.comments: The standard VAT rate in Martinique, Guadeloupe and Réunion is 8.5%. The reduced rate is 2.1%.

rates.category: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including Article 104 of the VAT Directive) ( Formerly restricted to: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including articles 104, 105 and 120 of the VAT Directive) )
rates.comments: For Corsica: 0.9% on sales of live animals to non-sujected to VAT entities, and on the first performances or circus.

rates.category: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including Article 104 of the VAT Directive) ( Formerly restricted to: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including articles 104, 105 and 120 of the VAT Directive) )
rates.comments: The super reduced rate in Martinique, Guadeloupe and Réunion is 1.05% (for the press).

rates.category: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs
rates.comments: Comments Products of agricultural, fishery, fish and poultry origin which have not undergone any processing and which are normally intended for use in agricultural production (article 278-0 bis A. 1°-0 bis of the general tax code). Excepted 0501 and 1704

rates.category: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including Article 104 of the VAT Directive) ( Formerly restricted to: Special reduced rate for specific regions (including articles 104, 105 and 120 of the VAT Directive) )
rates.comments: For Corsica: rate of 13% on oil products; 10% on construction works, sales on farm machinery, sales on eaten in products, etc.; 2.1% (reduced rate).
